text: In case you wanted to know how you can mock dependencies in Unit, Integration and Functional tests <http://artemzin.com/blog/how-to-mock-dependencies-in-unit-integration-and-functional-tests-dagger-robolectric-instrumentation/>

attachments.text: Hello, dear reader. Initially, this was a comment to Robolectric and Dagger 2 question on Reddit but it became so huge that I decided to turn it into a blog post, have a nice read! DI frameworks & Unit tests...
